Posts.Content: Hi Birty  yes I feel your pain. I had my picc line a week when started to get really bad pain, my district nurse was due when she see it she said go A&E. Ended up in hospital for a week :(  picc line was infected and also got a DVT which have to inject for 6 months. Had picc line out so am worrying now how going to have next chemo due next week as my veins gave up and had to have blood taken from my foot -ouch!! Hope all goes ok for you.  Debbie x
Posts.Title: June Chemo Club

Posts.Content: Hi All. Im at last home from my hospital stay. Had an infected picc line which also caused blood clot in my arm :( not good as only had line a week!! Got a very large bag of meds & got to do injection blood thinning everyday for 6 months!!  3rd FEC delayed until June 15th but feeling very nervous as don't know how they going to do it. My veins were really playing up and ended up with canulla & having blood taken from my feet :(  Not read any posts for a while, hope u all doing well.  Debbie x
Posts.Title: June Chemo Club

Posts.Content: Hi all. 4 weeks since I was told the dreaded words no one wants to hear. Due to have left side mastectomy, lymph node removed on same side then lumpectomy on right side this coming Wednesday. Nerves have definitely kicked in now because know it's start of my long journey.  Hadn't really told many people until Recently after  we told our 11 year old. Feeling really fed up with people saying Oh don't worry breast cancer is so easy to treat nowadays and the best line is oh I would have had both of them taken off and be done with it. They don't know what it feels like to be losing one so why say that. Aaaarrrgghhh! Makes me so angry its me and my body. Sorry rant over. Past week my mind has been a total mess :( hugs to everyone going for surgery, results or anything to do with this evil disease xxx
Posts.Title: feeling sad angry lonely and lots more

Posts.Content: Hi M sending a big hug and hope everything goes smoothly for you. Has Been a comfort reading comments, I too am feeling more upset and nervous approaching my first chemo than when I had my mastectomy and lymph removal a month ago. Will probably be in about 3 weeks. Been to first appointment, been told next one will be couple days before treatment   Been told to have my mirena coil taken out as well, something else to enjoy!  Dx
